page.title: 17SCOUT MOVEMENT
page.content: At eight years old you start cub scouts.The leaders have names like Akela,Raksha,Sherekhan,Kaa,Hathi,Chil and Baloo.These names are from the jungle book by Rudyard Kipling.At cubs you do tracking,play games,do experiments and make bivouacs. A bivouac is a hut made from sticks, straw and leaves.At eleven you become a more experienced scout.You do canoeing,cooking,rock climbing and camping.At sixteen you become a venture scout.You do abseiling,long hikes over mountainous areas and lots more.Robert Stephenson Smyth Baden Powell founded the scout movement after the Boer war because he was in the army scouts during the war and decided to make the scouts for young men.
